message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance the value of your business. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $2000000. This is an opportunity to secure a high-quality asset at a competitive rate, tailored to meet your specific needs. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if there's anything else I can assist you with.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value of your product, $2000000 is slightly above my budget. I'd be interested in purchasing if we could reach an agreement closer to $1500000.  I believe this would be a fair price for both of us and would allow me to move forward with this purchase.
